** comments: This document contains the various configuration options for the rules-based part matcher.
default catgories       - this is used to provide a bonus if we don't have any 'attr' to
specify the category of an item.  This bonus will be added to
items in the default category to encourage using that when matching
keywords                - this is used to pick up additional items that are not in a category.
When a keyword is seen in the item_components, all partslist items
containing that keyword will be added to the potential match list.
In addition, when matching, the number will be multiplied by the
factor in the calculation rather than using the length of the name.
detractors              - If one of these is present in one of the items being matched but not
in the other, subtract the value times the length of the detractor.
friends                 - Other categories (i.e. attrs) that should be included when you see
lumber categories       - Everything is pretty much assumed to be lumber so these are really
ony used to prevent something in hardware (as identified by hardware
terms) from matching something in one of these categories.
hardware categories     - These are the categories that are used for hardware items.
hardware terms          - If you see these items in the description, it's a hardware item.
